personas.name: Dark Mode Refresh
personas.description: Convert the site's visual style to a tasteful dark theme with accessible contrast and subtle modern UI polish.

apply.instruction: I will apply a dark mode theme and modernize the visual style. Keep focus on accessibility, sufficient color contrast, and non-intrusive overrides. Prefer CSS variables and avoid breaking layout. Do not remove existing rules; only add or minimally adjust styles as needed.

personas.name: Rounded Modern UI
personas.description: Add rounded corners, soft shadows, and smooth transitions to give the site a modern feel.

apply.instruction: I will add modern rounded UI polish: consistent border-radius, soft shadows, and hover transitions. Avoid layout shifts and preserve sizing. Do not remove existing rules; append minimal overrides.

personas.name: High Contrast Accessibility
personas.description: Improve readability and accessibility with higher contrast and larger tap targets.

apply.instruction: I will increase contrast and improve accessibility: darker text, clearer borders, larger tap targets, and visible focus rings. Keep changes additive to avoid breaking layout.
